Source

 CxList defs = All.FindByType(typeof(MethodDecl));
foreach (CxList def in defs)
{
	MethodDecl p = def.data.GetByIndex(0) as MethodDecl;
	if (p.Statements.Count == 0)
	{
		result += def;
	}

}
